name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Marinate the chicken with spices and curry powder for 20 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions until golden.
Add marinated chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk, mix well, and simmer for 20 minutes on low heat.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.

name: Pork Kottu
instructions: Cook pork in a pressure cooker with salt and pepper until tender.
Chop roti into thin strips.
Heat oil in a large pan, stir-fry vegetables with spices until aromatic.
Add cooked pork and roti strips to the pan and stir-fry for 5-10 minutes.
Serve with spicy curry sauce or chutney.

name: Chicken Biriyani
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, and lemon juice for 30 minutes.
Cook rice with whole spices (like bay leaves, cardamom, and cloves) until 80% done.
In a large pot, layer the marinated chicken and rice alternately.
Cover and cook on low heat (dum) for 30-40 minutes.
Mix gently before serving and garnish with fried onions and raisins.

name: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Boil macaroni in salted water until al dente, then drain.
In a saucepan, melt butter, whisk in flour, and cook for 2 minutes.
Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened.
Stir in shredded cheese until melted and creamy.
Combine macaroni with cheese sauce, transfer to a baking dish, and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20 minutes until golden.
